price: 32. Y cuando los veían, se decían: “Realmente, esos están extraviados (por seguir a Muhammad)”.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awhum qālū inna hāulāi laḍāllūna
